com.rssaggregator.android.utils

Class DatabaseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rssaggregator.android.utils.DatabaseUtils

  • public class DatabaseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which regroups utility attributes for database (SQLite Android).
